Config.Resource: SELECT product.LABEL as label, product.RATE as rate ,SUM(cus_tender.INVESTMENT) AS investment_total FROM DT_FIN_CUSTOMER cus LEFT JOIN DT_FIN_CUSTOMER_TENDER cus_tender ON cus.OUID = cus_tender.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT JOIN DT_FIN_TENDER tender ON cus_tender.TENDER_ID = tender.OUID LEFT JOIN DT_FIN_PRODUCT product ON tender.PRODUCT_ID = product.OUID WHERE cus.MARKETER_ID = {marketer_id} GROUP BY product.LABEL
